channel.title: Javac error - PLEASE LOOK
channel.description:
I have read the stickies. Didn't find a solution so that is why I'm posting.
This account was registered on Oct 26, 2006 and I have had this error before and fixed it but however, I jsut keep forgetting how... Well this is the problem:
I downloaded a Runescape Classic client, and when I click the .bat file to start playing, I get the classical "[i]'javac' isn't recognized...[/i]" error. Please, how do I fix this?
The more detailed the better. Thank you for reading.

item.title: Javac error - PLEASE LOOK
item.dc:creator: @Rare_z Rare z
item.description:
@Rare_z wrote:

I have read the stickies. Didn’t find a solution so that is why I’m posting.
